about.title: About
about.description: I am a Computer Science student at the State University of Maring√°. Currently I work as a Java developer at Fintech. My main areas of interest are Computer Graphics and Machine Learning. During my free time I like to learn new things, read a good book, watch a series, go out with friends and meet interesting people. I also play some games when I have idle time on weekends.
